_source.short_desc: talech is a cloud-based, Point of Sale software system for restaurants, bars, cafes, retail and service businesses.
_source.long_desc:
You can help grow your revenues and improve your margins with talech Point of Sale. Its easy-to-use interface is simple for staff to use while powerful features give you the tools to deliver a top quality customer experience. Grow your sales with Online Ordering that takes no commission. 

Add/track inventory with ease; split, merge & customize orders; manage employees + labor costs; build loyalty with our built-in CRM platform and much more. Includes free, always on 24/7 support
_source.pricing_details:
talech Mobile comes no monthly software fees (card processing fees will apply)

Monthly Plans:
Starter: $29/month for the first device + $29/month for each additional device.
Standard: $69/month for the first device + $29/month for each additional device.
Premium: $99/month for the first device + $29/month for each additional device.
_source.target_audience: talech is a great fit for multiple business types: Retail, Restaurants and Services. Apparel, cafes, quick serves, casual & full service restaurants, bars, venues, hair salons, barbers & nail bars

related_products.short_desc: Restaurant management platform that helps you fill seats, run smooth shifts, grow guest relationships, and drive more revenue.
related_products.features: With a global dining network of millions, more than nearly 60,000 restaurant partners, and the best restaurant management platform out there, OpenTable helps you grow your business. Easy-to-use solutions help you fill seats, run consistently smooth shifts, grow guest relationships, and drive more revenue.

related_products.short_desc: CAKE POS is designed to meet the unique needs of restaurants. A simple, intuitive and cost-friendly solution.
related_products.features:
CAKE built its POS to meet the demands of Quick & Full Service restaurants. It is simple, intuitive, and cost-friendly.

Easily handle Quick Service rush hours with line-busting OrderPads that control the flow of traffic and a customer-facing display for guests to privately pay, tip, and sign from their own screen. Supercharge your Full-Service POS with rich guest profiles and automatic table status updates. CAKE POS makes it easy for restaurants to get more done every day.

related_products.short_desc:
Routing chaos finally solved! Extremely easy-to-use, Route4Me plans routes for your business.

Call Today & Get Started
+1-888-552-9045
related_products.features:
Routing chaos finally solved. Extremely easy-to-use, Route4Me automatically plans routes for your business and dispatches them to a mobile app with built-in navigation. 

Perfect for field service, field sales, field marketing, territory management, and every business requiring last-mile optimization.

Route4Me provides the world's most used route sequencing and optimization software for small businesses and enterprises to over 35,000 customers.

Call Today & Get Started
+1-888-552-9045

related_products.short_desc: SpotOn Delivery powered by DoorDash allows clients to access delivery options for their diners.
related_products.features: SpotOn Order fits all of your in-person, pick-up, ordering, and delivery needs. With $0 commissions fees, brand your ordering experience to fit your brand with custom colors and your restaurant logo. Turn tables faster with our QR codes and get discovered online more easily with Order with Google.

related_products.short_desc: TapMango is a fully branded Online & Mobile Ordering and Customer Loyalty solution for retailers and restaurants
related_products.features: TapMango is a fully branded Online Ordering, Mobile Ordering and Loyalty solution offering the most advanced marketing to retailers and restaurants. With TapMango you can engage customers with our powerful SMS/Email marketing, get new customers with our referral system and online review boost, increase revenue with flash sales and mobile ordering, integrate with your POS and so much more. Paired with a world-class customer support team, TapMango is powering thousands of happy merchants.

related_products.short_desc: Onfleet's software simplifies your local delivery operations from start to finish. Start your free trial today!
related_products.features: Onfleet's modern, delightful Food Delivery software makes it easy for food delivery businesses to manage their fleet. Onfleet includes intuitive smartphone apps for drivers, a real-time web dashboard for dispatchers, and automated SMS notifications and driver tracking for your customers. Our API allows for integration into online ordering and other systems. Our software has powered millions of deliveries for couriers in 60+ countries around the world. Start your free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: Our Robust SaaS product which helps you save more than 15% of logistics costs by optimizing your fleet, distribution routes & capacity.
related_products.features: LogiNext Mile is a state-of-the-art last mile distribution and route optimization software which enables you to save costs by optimizing your delivery routes, automating delivery resource allocation, and scheduling dispatch while dynamically tracking all on-ground movements. Rated globally as the best solution, LogiNext Mile offers the most comprehensive distribution logistics and delivery route optimization solution making your route planning and resource management flawless.

related_products.short_desc: NCR Aloha is an end-to-end solution that helps restaurants increase efficiency, drive revenue and redefine their guest experience.
related_products.features: NCR Aloha is a cloud-enabled tech platform that helps operators embrace digital transformation to run every aspect of the restaurant, drive on- and off-premise revenue, streamline management and exceed guest expectations. With an all-in-one subscription model, core capabilities include fixed and mobile POS, contactless dining, analytics, online ordering, 3rd party delivery integrations and more. Used in thousands of restaurants worldwide, more staff are trained on Aloha than any other POS.

related_products.short_desc: Complete technology suite to grow your food delivery business.
related_products.features:
Complete Technology Suite for Food Delivery Business. Automate Order Management, Delivery Dispatch, Real-Time Delivery Tracking
& Marketing Campaigns to Scale your Restaurant Business.

Manage All Orders in One Place:
Smart Dashboard to receive & manage orders from all sources at a single place. Track complete order fulfilment cycle from order received to dispatched to delivered. Take in time actions like delete, cancel and re-assign delivery with a single click.

related_products.short_desc: Add online ordering to your restaurant website in minutes. Manage incoming orders, pickups, and food delivery from a simple mobile app.
related_products.features: Take online orders for pickup, food delivery, and table side service from a simple, elegant platform. Update menus and pricing, view sales reports, and launch marketing campaigns across multiple restaurant locations from any web browser. It's all made easy with GloriaFood. Create your free account and add online ordering to your restaurant's website in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Track-POD is paperless & contactless last-mile delivery management software with a real-time dispatcher dashboard + an ePOD driver app.
related_products.features:
Cut your delivery costs with an all-in-one tool for route planning, fleet optimization, live driver tracking, and paperless & contactless Proof of Delivery.
Track-POD does what other last-mile trackers do + offers 10 user roles for web dashboard, offline driver app, 5-star Customer Portal, and advanced vehicle checks. From barcode scanning to photo proof of partial deliveries -- you have ready-made solutions to every issue out there, to make sure you deliver more, safer, faster, and cheaper.

similar_products.short_desc: Flex - online ordering and delivery software. Amazing solution for restaurants, cafes & food businesses.
similar_products.features:
Flex helps restaurants, cafes and food businesses sell more, delivery, save time and money.

Flex has made delivering orders locally simple and easy. With the online ordering website and on-demand delivery, a courier from a reliable local delivery service provider will be dispatched automatically to your business.

Flex - best in the industry online ordering website.

similar_products.short_desc:

similar_products.features:
Grow Business. Gain Regulars

Join the 18,000+ pizzerias nationwide that are already part of the Slice family.

Our online ordering and automated marketing creates loyal customers to grow your business - our partners see up to 50% more repeat customers.

similar_products.short_desc: Square for Restaurants powers front and back of house operations for your full-service, quick-service, or fast-casual restaurant, bar
similar_products.features: The Square for Restaurants Point of Sale platform powers your speed and flexibility across front and back of house operations for your full-service restaurant, quick-service restaurant, fast-casual restaurant, bar or brewery. Handle online ordering, menus, table layouts, cover counts, coursing, payment processing, real-time reporting, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Streamline food delivery with Oracle Simphony POS Integrate Oracle GloriaFood online ordering for free.
similar_products.features: Oracle Simphony POS makes your restaurant's food delivery operations efficient, easy & profitable. Our cloud-based POS helps restaurants easily manage online orders, kitchen ops, inventory, menus, delivery staff & 3rd parties, loyalty programs & more in a single platform. Real-time analytics are included so you always have a pulse on sales, costs and delivery partner performance. Simphony's open API & extensive cloud marketplace gives you unlimited flexibility & agility.

similar_products.short_desc: Digital restaurant platform that is compatible with web, in-store and mobile channels to increase spending and engagement.
similar_products.features: All-in-one digital restaurant engagement platform. We offer online ordering, native mobile app, loyalty, gift, and full marketing suite powered by true machine learning in a single platform. We also partner with your POS for a seamless operator and guest experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Software for managing on-demand food delivery. Tailored to the needs of local delivery service providers & delivery marketplaces.
similar_products.features:
We are focused on the needs of on-demand delivery service providers and delivery marketplaces.
-	Automate dispatch and handle from 100 to 10,000+ orders a day 
-	Better leverage your couriers (and give them a simple & intuitive app)
-	Provide your business clients with a portal for creating orders, tracking couriers and deliveries
-	Provide end-users with an order tracking link
-	Manage several cities under one account

The system is highly configurable & can be adjusted to any delivery routine.

similar_products.short_desc: Smart delivery software that helps restaurants to track all the orders and in-house delivery fleet live on a single page. 90 DAYS FREE!
similar_products.features:
We offer 90 DAYS FREE TRIAL for the FIRST 10 RESTAURANTS IN THE US. 
TraceItUp helps restaurants to reduce operational costs and increase sales by making their chaotic delivery process, a better experience.
By using our SaaS service, companies, of any size, will be able to track their fleet without any extra effort. And they will be serving their customers a higher level of service by letting them track their orders live on their smartphones.

similar_products.short_desc: OnnaWay is the #1 Food Delivery System.
similar_products.features:
OnnaWay is the #1 Food Delivery System.  
 It provides companies the fastest and easiest courier system in the market. - Dispatch orders to workers in seconds - Easily track your drivers on a map - Best routing for drivers - See real time order status - See order start & completed times. - See real time order ETA times - Allow customers to get an order ETA - Online Ordering for customers.  Companies using OnnaWay have increased revenue by over 43% on average in the first year.

similar_products.short_desc: Track-POD is paperless & contactless last-mile delivery management software with a real-time dispatcher dashboard + an ePOD driver app.

Cut your delivery costs with an all-in-one tool for route planning, fleet optimization, live driver tracking, and paperless & contactless Proof of Delivery.

similar_products.short_desc: Upper Crew is an advanced route optimization software and mobile app designed to help FOOD Delivery business owners.
similar_products.features:
Upper Crew is an advanced route optimization software and mobile app designed to help FOOD DELIVERY BUSINESS owners.

Whether you deliver pre-cooked meals, meal-kits, catering supplies, hampers, alcoholic beverages or packaged food, you can streamline and optimize your delivery process, delight your customers with on-time deliveries and compete effectively in the rapidly-expanding industry of food delivery, with Upper by your side.  

Sign up for a 7 day free trial today!

similar_products.short_desc: Helping F&B players to dodge commission fees via a branded app, webshop and success consultancy to attract and retain customers.
similar_products.features: EasyOrder provides digital transformation services for F&B businesses by delivering a branded app, direct ordering webpage and optional ordering kiosks. The EasyOrder ecosystem allows end-users to order ahead and pay online and enjoy a best-in-class user experience. Benefits like app-only specials, loyalty systems, promotions, coupon codes or exclusive announcements allow businesses to engage with their customers through relevant content and tailored offerings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant Management software integrates and automates accounting, scheduling and inventory control for restaurants. Restaurant Management applications typically offer a broad range of features that encompass traditional business necessities such as accounting, customer contact information, supplier data and payroll as well as restaurant-specific requirements such as table reservation management, guest management and menu costing. These applications also integrate with point of sale solutions and onsite or online credit card processing systems. Restaurant Management software is related to Food Service Distribution software and Food Service Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant POS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant POS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant POS software offers point of sale solutions specifically for the restaurant and bar industries. This type of software provides ordering, billing, reporting, accounting, table tracking, and receipt printing capabilities for restaurants and bars. Hardware such as computers, monitors and printers is often included in the purchase of POS systems. Restaurant POS software is related to POS software and Restaurant Management software.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

_source.short_desc: talech is a secure, easy-to-use, cloud-based, iPad point-of-sale software solution for service businesses like salons, spas and more
_source.long_desc:
For salons, spas and a range of service businesses, talech POS software helps streamline tasks, improve your margins and grow your revenue.

With a few clicks, merchants can do so much; take appointments via a free customer facing website; create timed-services & staff profiles; manage employees & monitor labor costs; build loyalty with our built-in CRM platform  

talech comes with free, always on 24/7 support
_source.pricing_details:
talech Mobile comes no monthly software fees (card processing fees will apply)

Monthly Plans:
Starter: $29/month for the first device + $29/month for each additional device.
Standard: $69/month for the first device + $29/month for each additional device.
Premium: $99/month for the first device + $29/month for each additional device.
_source.target_audience: talech is a great fit for multiple business types: Retail, Restaurants and Services. Apparel, cafes, quick serves, casual & full service restaurants, bars, venues, hair salons, barbers & nail bars

related_products.short_desc: Reach more clients with the simple, customizable scheduling solution that looks and feels as good as a day at the salon.
related_products.features: With Acuity Scheduling, booking clients looks and feels as good as the services you provide for them. Customize individual calendars for your staff and locations, and set up appointment types that keep clients coming back for more, including gift certificates and multi-service bookings. Empower clients to book and pay directly from your website or social profile. Acuity will be there to automate branded emails and texts to keep your clients in the loop, on time, and in control of rescheduling.

related_products.short_desc: Use Vagaro Salon Software & Apps to get booked, process payments, send reminders and market your business. Starting Price: $25/month.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one salon management software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Reach more customers Text & Email Marketing. Get booked on the Vagaro Marketplace and on social media. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage appointments and packages while on the go. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
related_products.features: Mindbody elevates your customer experience - from the moment they find your salon on our app to their next visit. Step up your salon with marketing automations, scheduling, staff management, payment processing, automated reminders, reporting, and more. Building your brand? Get a custom app, too. Save time and give your clients the attention they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Fresha is the world's leading software for salons and spas and is totally subscription-free!
related_products.features: Fresha is the world's leading booking software for salons and is totally subscription-free! Join 70,000+ businesses and 250,000 professionals who use Fresha to boost their sales in 120+ countries. Fresha is a simple, flexible and powerful booking software with all the advanced features you need to run your salon. Optional paid features include integrated payment processing for deposits and no-show protection. Only pay for what you use, with zero monthly fees

related_products.short_desc: #1 Marketing Platform For SMB's! Create a Free Account
related_products.features: Get everything you need to manage and grow your business,  all from a singular platform  create your free account today to explore the platform and compare plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for Salons! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.
related_products.features: SimplyBook.me offers the most extensive online booking system on the market for Salons, one that makes you look professional and solves all your online needs. You get a full blown website, or a booking widget if you already have a website, where you can present your business and accept appointments, sell products, gift cards and service add-ons. Manage your Salon with one solution; website, accept bookings, marketing initiatives, business statistics and,online and on site payments.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based online booking, scheduling, point of sale and marketing software - everything you need to make your life easier.
related_products.features: Booker's cutting-edge salon software helps your run and grow your salon with an all-in-one platform that understands you'd rather be focusing on your clients instead of your administrative duties. Manage your online bookings, point-of-sale, membership and loyalty programs, all while attracting new clients, and making sure they come back. Access your salon business anytime, anywhere, all on Booker's secure, cost-effective, cloud-based software.

related_products.short_desc: Level up with Zenoti, the all-in-one software solution for beauty, wellness, and fitness brands, trusted by 20,000+ businesses.
related_products.features: Zenoti gives multi-chair salons the most complete cloud-based software solution, trusted by 20,000+ beauty and wellness businesses worldwide. Salons can unify operations across locations and streamline appointment scheduling, POS, marketing, CRM, and more. Guests can book appointments, check-in, and auto-pay, all from the salon's branded mobile app. Providers and staff can view guest preferences, tips, and commissions in real-time. See how Zenoti can drive growth for your salon.

related_products.short_desc: Timely salon software runs your whole business from any device. Easily manage your calendar, clients, staff, stock, reporting & more!
related_products.features:
We're here to grow the value of the beauty industry, with you and for you. Join the Timely community of 46,000 supportive & connected beauty professionals and get access to innovative business management software, award-winning customer support, education from the biggest industry names all over the world, and support from your peers.
Timely is designed to suit your business at any size, stage and budget. We love helping you succeed, so join us today! Start a free 14-day trial at gettimely.com.

related_products.short_desc: Simple, powerful, appointment booking software for service providers and their clients. Includes online calendar and downloadable app.
related_products.features:
Simple, powerful, appointment booking tool that you and your clients will love! Use the scheduler anywhere: the app or any browser. Customers can book with ease using the Visibook app or online calendar.
Easy booking and customer tracking.
Reduce no-shows.
Individual and class scheduler.
Payments tool.
Client messaging and notes.
Simple, free set up.
Control your schedule.
Work around your personal calendar.
Less email and hassle.
Manage staff.
Multi-Platform tool.

Guests can book appointments, check-in, and auto-pay, all from the salon's branded mobile app. Providers and staff can view guest preferences, tips, and commissions in real-time. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Scheduling software streamlines the process of scheduling clients, patients, and meetings. This type of software promotes efficiency by eliminating double-bookings and automating scheduling of recurring appointments. It also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and provide clients with the most suitable appointment options. Appointment Scheduling software often includes reminder tools that help ensure timely attendance of scheduled meetings and appointments. Appointment Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Medical Scheduling software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Spa software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Spa tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Spa software automates and manages health/medical spa operations. Medical Spa (also called Med Spa or Medi Spa) solutions typically feature easy integration with cash registers, bar code readers and other point of sale hardware. Medical Spas provide treatments including skin tightening, laser hair removal, peels, liposuction, cosmetic dental work and more. Medical Spas typically use these applications to add efficiency and value to a wide variety of business processes including: appointment scheduling, online calendar, client management and marketing, employee data, commission calculation, inventory control, payroll, point of sale and others. For related products see Salon software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Spa software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Spa tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Spa software automates all aspects of business management for various types of spas, including day spas. Software functionality typically includes inventory management, appointment scheduling, gift card processing, point of sale, and other retail customer service oriented capabilities. Spa software is related to Medical Spa software and Salon Software
